00002 ! Subroutine : Stats
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)

00037 
00038  SUBROUTINE Stats
00039 
00040 !  Common Variables
00041  USE NTypes, ONLY : DBL
00042  USE Domain, ONLY : iStep, invInitVol, invPi, tCall, xmax_f, xmin_f, ymax_f, ymin_f
00043  USE FluidParams
00044  IMPLICIT NONE
00045 
00046 !  Local Variables
00047  INTEGER :: i, j, nodesIn, nodesOut
00048  INTEGER :: IO_ERR
00049  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Pin, Pout, Pdif, Perr, R, Ro, Ref, Ux, Uy, Vef, Vol
00050 
00051 ! Initialize
00052  Pin  = 0.D0
00053  Pout = 0.D0
00054  Ux   = 0.D0
00055  Uy   = 0.D0
00056  Vol  = 0.D0
00057  nodesIn  = 0
00058  nodesOut = 0
00059  Ro = bubbles(1,3)
00060 
00061 
00062 ! Loop through all nodes inside the bubble
00063  DO j = ymin_f, ymax_f
00064    DO i = xmin_f, xmax_f
00065 
00066      IF ( rho_f(i,j) < rhoStar ) THEN
00067        Ux  = Ux + u_f(i,j,1)
00068        Uy  = Uy + u_f(i,j,2)
00069        Vol = Vol + 1.D0
00070      END IF
00071 
00072      R =  DSQRT( ( DBLE(i)-bubbles(1,1) )**2 + ( DBLE(j)-bubbles(1,2) )**2 )
00073      IF ( R < (Ro - 2.D0*IntWidth) ) THEN
00074        Pin = Pin + p_f(i,j)
00075        nodesIn = nodesIn + 1
00076      ELSE IF ( R > (Ro + 2.D0*IntWidth) ) THEN
00077        Pout = Pout + p_f(i,j)
00078        nodesOut = nodesOut + 1
00079      END IF
00080 
00081    END DO
00082  END DO
00083 
00084 ! Save the initial volume during the first time step
00085  IF( istep == 0 ) THEN
00086    invInitVol = 1.D0/Vol
00087  END IF
00088  
00089  Ux  = Ux/Vol
00090  Uy  = Uy/Vol
00091  Ref = DSQRT( Vol*invPi )
00092  Vef = Vol*invInitVol
00093 
00094  Pin  = Pin/DBLE(nodesIn)
00095  Pout = Pout/DBLE(nodesOut)
00096  Pdif = Pin - Pout
00097  Perr = ( sigma/Ro - Pdif )*Ro/sigma
00098 
00099  OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "stats.out", STATUS = "UNKNOWN", POSITION = "APPEND", &
00100       IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00101  IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00102    WRITE(10,'(I9,6ES19.9)')istep,Ux,Uy,Vef,Ref,Pdif,Perr
00103    CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00104  ELSE
00105    CALL MemAlloc(2)
00106    STOP "Error: Unable to open output file 'stats.out'."
00107  END IF
00108 
00109 ! Analyze convergence - Done over a certain period of time ( 10 x tStats ) to 
00110 ! ensure that long range fluctuations do not give false positives
00111  Convergence(tCall) = Pdif
00112  IF ( MOD(tCall,11) == 0 ) THEN
00113    eps   = 0.D0
00114    tCall = 1
00115    DO i = 2, 11
00116      eps = eps + DABS( Convergence(i) - Convergence(i-1) )
00117    END DO
00118    eps = eps*0.1D0/Pdif
00119  ELSE
00120    tCall = tCall + 1
00121  END IF
00122 
00123  RETURN
00124  END SUBROUTINE Stats
00125
